title: BINOBI
author: BINOBI
created_time: April 23, 2023, 09:55:38 PMLast edit: May 11, 2023, 04:24:00 PM by BINOBI

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcoin but before anything else can you please clarify if you are the official representative of Binobi even though you have it as your username you will still have to prove it because you have this at the name of the link that leads to the sign-up page cid=8IZWEOI cannot ask you to get a copper account or hire a designer without first addressing this.

comments.author: BINOBI
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on April 23, 2023, 10:45:09 PMWelcome to Bitcoin but before anything else can you please clarify if you are the official representative of Binobi even though you have it as your username you will still have to prove it because you have this at the name of the link that leads to the sign-up page cid=8IZWEOI cannot ask you to get a copper account or hire a designer without first addressing this.Hello, I am the official representative of Binobi.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: the site seems great. but the interface has the feeling of being in the binance, maybe because of the theme colour. anyway, is binobi working on their gambling license? seems everything is ready on this site. it is good that you will be offering free play also, this will attract new users to try your site. with regard to kyc requirements, based from your registration terms, you may ask valid proof of identity when deem necessary. would be good if you are already licensed before you start asking from your players about kyc.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Quote from: BINOBI on April 23, 2023, 10:49:45 PMHello, I am the official representative of Binobi.If you are an official representative of this casino then you have to buy a copper member to be able to display interesting threads.This is a list of designers that you may need for their services, just choose from one of them. [Overview] Bitcointalk Services from Bitcointalk MembersOne more want to ask where is this licensed casino located?As in general, the casinos here have a license.

comments.author: BINOBI
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on April 23, 2023, 11:15:15 PMthe site seems great. but the interface has the feeling of being in the binance, maybe because of the theme colour. anyway, is binobi working on their gambling license? seems everything is ready on this site. it is good that you will be offering free play also, this will attract new users to try your site. Hello, of course, the Curaçao license is already in process, there will also be a license from Ukraine. There will be a major update in the next few days. Free games are already in development.The platform was developed from scratch, with more than 10 senior developers on staff.

comments.body: Quote from: aioc on April 23, 2023, 10:45:09 PMWelcome to Bitcoin but before anything else can you please clarify if you are the official representative of Binobi even though you have it as your username you will still have to prove it because you have this at the name of the link that leads to the sign-up page cid=8IZWEOI cannot ask you to get a copper account or hire a designer without first addressing this.This could be a tracking link not an affiliate link.I contacted their customer support via live chat and they confirmed this indeed their official representative.After clearing this up, I believe they should listen to your advice and by a copper membership and create a proper announcement thread. BTW, welcome to bitcointalk Binobi!

Providers connected officially!

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: maybe adding more promos in Games and rounds section so many people will try your website.i just saw the Awards and it seems the rewards from rank-up are pretty low because I saw other websites that offer the same thing.for level 3 on BINOBI, we will get 5 USDT while other websites give 3x that amount even the same total wager.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Welcome to the forum mate. The casinos name and ANN design are unique and yet attractive. I love the Golden and black color specifically in the ANN thread, it just giving me the feeling of seeing something premium. I can see that you have made a lot of claim like “Best” casino and tons of games. So let me ask some basic questions before I try the site that is missing in the OP. What are the wagering requirements for the 150% deposit bonus? Do we need to give KYC in order to withdraw? At last players from all across the globe are eligible to play on the site or not? Waiting for these answers.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: Nrcewker on April 24, 2023, 02:06:43 AMWelcome to the forum mate. The casinos name and ANN design are unique and yet attractive. I love the Golden and black color specifically in the ANN thread, it just giving me the feeling of seeing something premium.It is good choice from the team with the color theme, Yellow and Black. The name and the design of logo give us feeling like this service is from Binance.If the BINOMI team want to redesign their announcement thread better, or even redesign their logo, they will have many options to do that:- Assign that task to their internal designers- Hire an outsourced designer like jayce who is very trusted, professional and skillful designer in Bitcointalk community.- Run art contests for their Announcement thread design or for their avatar design.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Welcome to this forumWe can't see much activity going on in your casino from the activity display, but that's okay because your casino is still new.The appearance of your website is very similar to the appearance of the Binance exchange, maybe because it is dominated by the same color as the exchange, which is dark and gold.There are lots of countries on the list that cannot play at your casino, will you block them directly during registration?Because sometimes casinos allow people to register and end up having problems making withdrawals and so on.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: BINOBI on April 23, 2023, 11:30:06 PMWe bought the Rank, now we will decorate the theme beautifully.cid=8IZWEO - right, this is the tracking link.Thanks, we're happy too. Providers connected officially!So far so good you are doing great, you've got a copper account and you've hired a designer for your thread maybe launch a signature campaign not really necessary immediately but you can post if you have the plan to do in the immediate future.Something very interesting is this https://binobi.com/bonuses-policy, not all casinos have a specific page for their bonus policy, it's well explained and so are the TOS and privacy policy.You just have to be active as much as possibly being a newly launched casino here in Bitcointalk.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: you have shown true interest in dealing here after buying copper membership rightaway after being asked and that is a good start mate because this shows you are willing to advertise completely.Welcome to the forum guys ,any plans of extending your advertising providing Signature campaign or at least bounty?and nice to hear that you are already acquiring License from Curacao so players will feel safe though there is no assurance of being one .

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Quote from: entebah on April 23, 2023, 11:39:37 PMi just saw the Awards and it seems the rewards from rank-up are pretty low because I saw other websites that offer the same thing.for level 3 on BINOBI, we will get 5 USDT while other websites give 3x that amount even the same total wager. Yes the level up rewards seems to be the lowest one compared to the other casinos with similar rank up reward system. Since they have said that they are in process of changing the reward system, lets see and wait the changes they make in the reward system. They should be able to provide competitive rewards in order to be competitive and attractive so new players want to come and play here.

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: The website interface is clean and slick, but I just feel if I've saw similar site interface like your casino.It seems like the Binobi Box is faucet, isn't? do you will allow someone to withdraw their winnings by just gamble with faucet?I see you're have daily task, this could attract and people to gamble daily since they will get reward everyday.My suggestion is you can add sportsbook in the near future because many of gamblers are prefer to gamble on sports.

Waiting for these answers.Hello, KYC is not needed for depositing and withdrawing money. Players can play from anywhere in the world where the gaming business is allowed. At the moment we have a restriction on the United States of America.

comments.author: BINOBI
comments.body: Quote from: Strongkored on April 24, 2023, 03:03:36 AMWelcome to this forumWe can't see much activity going on in your casino from the activity display, but that's okay because your casino is still new.The appearance of your website is very similar to the appearance of the Binance exchange, maybe because it is dominated by the same color as the exchange, which is dark and gold.There are lots of countries on the list that cannot play at your casino, will you block them directly during registration?Because sometimes casinos allow people to register and end up having problems making withdrawals and so on.Hello, we will not block access to the site players, the restriction on the country are from the provider and not from us. If there are many available providers, there will be no problems with the withdrawal of funds. Thank you!
